original_text: I am not saying that I have already reached that place in my life. I have not yet completely become the person that God wants me to be. But I am trying very hard to reach that place. That was Christ's purpose when he first made me his own.
korean_text: 내가 이미 얻었다 함도 아니요 온전히 이루었다 함도 아니라 오직 내가 그리스도 예수께 잡힌 바 된 그것을 잡으려고 달려가노라

sentences.original_text: that I have already reached that place in my life
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이미 삶에서 그곳에 도달했다는 것을

sentences.original_text: I have not yet completely become
the person that God wants me to be
But I am trying very hard
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 매우 열심히 노력하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: when he first made me his own
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 처음 나를 자신의 것으로 삼으셨을 때
